verses.verse: Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>, Keep<WH8104> you judgment<WH4941>, and do<WH6213> justice<WH6666>: for my salvation<WH3444> is near<WH7138> to come<WH935>, and my righteousness<WH6666> to be revealed<WH1540>.

The Lord<WH136> God<WH3069> which gathers<WH6908> the outcasts<WH1760> of Israel<WH3478> says<WH5002>, Yet will I gather<WH6908> others to him<WH6908>, beside those that are gathered unto him.

Yes<WH5794>, they are greedy dogs<WH3611> which can<WH3045> never have<WH3045> enough<WH7654>, and they are shepherds<WH7462> that cannot understand<WH995>: they all look<WH6437> to their own way<WH1870>, every one<WH376> for his gain<WH1215>, from his quarter<WH7097>.
